part.narration: December 12, 2011. The Sega Corporation has filed for bankruptcy.

Nozomi and the team leave Headquarter doors, cardboard boxes of belongings in hand. Nozomi carries two. She drops them.The action buttons reappear. The Player can once again press them; however all buttons are blank-labeled.Nozomi drops to the ground and stares at the unbroken bottle of pinot blanc. She cries.
Family and friend and employee and comrade sit around the table of the bar. They clink glasses together. Asami cries.
part.line: I — I didn't know — I didn't read the papers —
I feared my daughter would never be in them —
part.narration: Zoom out.The bartender puts his hand on Asami's shoulder.
part.line: If it weren't for your daughter,
part.narration: The bartender looks around the bar. At the same-landed and different-landed
Asami wipes her face with her tissue.The cursor reappears. The Player can once again draw paths, though none shall follow them.The bartender raises his pinot blanc glass.

Nozomi sits on the couch that is hers. In the room that is hers. Every day increases the quantity of bottles of alcohol that are hers. Sudden cut between each day until the last.Nozomi is in the hospital. Liver disease. She comes to and looks around.Sudden cut.Nozomi leaves the hospital through the fifth story window.Screen darken.
